Description:
Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.

Author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Direct Autorun Keys Modification
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\reg.exe' and command like '%add%') and (command like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run%' or command like '%\software\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\winlogon\userinit%' or command like '%\software\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\winlogon\shell%' or command like '%\software\microsoft\windows nt\currentversion\windows%' or command like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\explorer\user shell folders%' or command like '%\system\currentcontrolset\control\safeboot\alternateshell%'))
